desc: MedHedzz creates custom surgical scrub hats right here in Canada. Customize your med head by selecting your style and fabric. Then place your first order with the click of a button! Our medhedzz hats are 100% cotton - we are a greener scrub hat alternative to the plastic disposable options.

layout.text: Ordering your custom scrub hat is

First, select your favorite MedHedzz scrub hat style, then choose your fabric from our selection of top fabric designers.
Doesn't get much easier than that.
